message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. After reconsidering, I'm willing to offer you the product for $850000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the unique features and benefits of my product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $800000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the deal.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $812500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $812500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the deal.
